name: IdeaVim
description:
Vim emulation plugin for IntelliJ Platform-based IDEs.


IdeaVim supports many Vim features including normal/insert/visual modes, motion keys, deletion/changing, marks, registers, some Ex commands, Vim regexps, configuration via ~/.ideavimrc, macros, Vim plugins, etc.


See also:

  • GitHub repository: documentation and contributing
  • Issue tracker: feature requests and bug reports
notes:
Features:

  • Support several buffer management commands VIM-1062, VIM-2335

Fixes:

  • VIM-2317 Fix memory leak
  • VIM-1357 VIM-1566 Fix external filters
  • VIM-2336 Fix repeat for the T movement
  • VIM-1192 Fix dollar motion from single command
  • VIM-1672 IdeaVim correctly populates clipboard history
  • VIM-2351 Correctly select last character when selecting with mouse

Merged PRs:

  • 332 by Matt Ellis: VIM-1357+VIM-1566: Use OS shell to run filter command
  • 333 by Michal Placek: VIM-1062
  • 334 by Michal Placek: vim-2335 Support for navigation to previous buffer with :b#
